title: Game Theory: Minecraft and The Power of The Dead
author: The Game Theorists
description:
Special thanks to Raycon for sponsoring this video!
Get 15% off your order! ► https://buyraycon.com/matpat

LAST CHANCE to Get Your 10th Anniversary Game Theory Merch! ► https://bit.ly/3fx9W2C

I've covered some of Minecraft's dark secrets when it comes to souls. Today, we are diving even further into the mystery that is the Nether and what powers it. Theorists, has Minecraft learned to harness the power of the dead? It's time to find out!

Find the game here ► https://www.minecraft.net/en-us
